pharmaversedata 0.0.0.9001

  • Changelog

pharmaversedata

The goal of pharmaversedata is to make it easy to access pharmaverse data, metadata, and its documentation.

Installation

You can install the development version of pharmaversedata from GitHub with:

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("maurolepore/pharmaversedata")

Example 

library(tibble)
library(pharmaversedata)
#> Loading required package: pharmaverseadam
#> Loading required package: pharmaversesdtm

adam_datasets
